I-Lani Edwards (born 20 September 2005) is an English professional footballer who plays as a midfielder for  club Hereford, on loan from Aston Villa.
Career
Edwards began his career at Aston Villa, joining the academy aged 10, and was included in the squad list for the club's 2024–25 UEFA Champions League campaign. He signed his first professional contract with the club in July 2024.
On 7 August 2025, Edwards joined National League North club Hereford on loan.
